title: Media
text: Working at Biosphere 2 presents me with many opportunites to be covered in the media.I am starting to lose track of my media appearances so this page will help me keep track of my public image.

title: Lia Noel Crocker
text: I am a biosystems engineer working as a research specialist for the ocean at Biosphere 2.

title: Media
